text: Proto-Georgian-Zan (also referred to as Proto-Karto-Zan) is a reconstructed language which is the common ancestor of Karto-Zan languages. It had already branched out of the Proto-Kartvelian language during the last centuries of the 3rd millennium BCE. ==References== * Category:Agglutinative languages Category:Kartvelian languages Georgian-Zan Category:Georgian-Zan languages
title: Proto-Georgian-Zan language
